body.name: Mini Projector, 5G WiFi Dual Bluetooth Projector, Portable Home Movie Projector 1080P, 9000 Lumens Video Projector with HDMI, USB, TV Stick, Smartphone, Laptop, Gaming, Home Theater
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 48 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 19 hrs 3 mins
features: 【Immersive Home Theater】The hd projector supports 1080P HD, let you see more details of picture. 9000LM screen brightness uniformity, will not easily make you visual fatigue, 90% NTCS, and high contrast ratio, presenting a realistic, dynamic and colorful projection image quality. You can watch movies as if you were in a movie theater, following film to travel to different universes! Electronic focus through remote control to focus, from the experience is more smooth than the manual focus.

【Mini Projector as Ideal Gift】This mini outdoor projector has a unique and elegant design, only the size of your palm. It is small enough to fit in your bag and take it out anytime, anywhere. Carry it with you as your good friend to travel with you, and it will do what it can to bring you more happiness. Also you can buy it as a present for children, lover and friends, let the film entertainment is not limited by space.

【Dual-Band WiFi & Screen Mirroring/Casting】The indoor wifi projector can be connected to 5G WiFi and 2.4G WiFi. The 2.4G WiFi is stable and has wide coverage, and the 5G WiFi is faster and more efficient to bring you a lag-free viewing experience. Use the screen mirroring feature as an extension screen of your phone or laptop, having a big screen to browse photos, videos, apps, and play games is more fascinating.

【Bidirectional Bluetooth 5.1 & HiFi Stereo Speakers】Bluetooth 5.1 transmits faster and longer distances than 5.0. Bluetooth 5.1 transmission speed increased to 2Mbps, distance increased to 4 times. Bidirectional Bluetooth also makes it an audio device, so you can use wireless bluetooth projector as a speaker. HiFi Stereo Speakers maximize restoration of sound authenticity, whether you're into music, games, films, or TV dramas, delivers greater richness and realism to sounds than ever before.

【Multiple Devices Compatible & 2-year Warranty】The iphone projector is equipped with multiple ports, including HDMI, USB, and 3.5mm audio jack, which can be connected to laptop, TV stick/box, DVD player, smartphone, wired headset, Bluetooth speaker, etc. You can use it to hold a birthday party, enjoy a wonderful movie or play an exciting game. We will provide professional customer service and two-year warranty, if you have any questions please contact us, it is our pleasure to serve you!

Lanthanum Glass Coated Lens The lens is made of lanthanum glass, more durable compared to resin lenses, more EP compared to conventional glass lenses. Efficient Heat Dissipation Equipped with 3 variable-speed fans for efficient heat dissipation to ensure a better picture, but fan noise does not exceed 30 dB. Sleep Timer: 24H customization If you fall asleep while watching a movie, projector will automatically shut down according to the time you set.

Anti-fall "TV" A child may injured when he shakes or falls down the TV screen by accident, but you do not have such worries when you use a projector. Precise Electronic Focus Upgrade from manual to electronic focus, you can use remote to adjust focus. This will be a boon for those video projectors which are ceiling mounted. Ideal Gift You can buy it as a present for children, lover, and friends. It means that you are always there for your children, lover, and friends. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use & compact..
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s a pretty great device all around. It’s not 4K, but the picture itself is pretty clear. My kids enjoy watching their favorite movie on the big screen, like if they’re at the theater..I did have an issue with adding my Wifi password, but their staff was quick & helped me with a simple device update. He also gave me step by step instructions on how to apply the update. Everything works great, my Xbox X looks great on it, streaming movies, mirroring my phone to show off photos.. It’s definitely worth the money. Highly recommend, & if you travel, it’s very compact easy to transport with you on trips. You can also connect your laptop like I did & use it for a presentation at work, or just to extend your screen to watch movies. Haha They did a great job with this one, the staff is very friendly & helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Mini Projector!
reviews.reviewText: The 5G WiFi connectivity and Dual Bluetooth options make it incredibly versatile. Streaming content from my smartphone or laptop is a breeze. It's also compatible with various devices such as TV sticks and gaming consoles, adding to its versatility.Setting up the projector is a straightforward process, and the included HDMI and USB ports provide multiple options for connecting different devices. The remote control is intuitive and user-friendly.The built-in speakers produce decent sound quality, and for a more immersive experience, I can easily connect external speakers via Bluetooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value projector with some flaws but good overall.
reviews.reviewText: This is a good projector for the price ... obviously, it's hard not to expect cinema quality out of a projector, but you do have to realize that if you want true movie theater-like performance, $500 is about the entry-level for that. This really needs to be in a totally blacked out room in order to be enjoyable, or else you'd be better off buying a large screen television. Most will be projecting this onto a 100 foot 16:9 ratio screen, which is not 100 inches, but that's the diagonal measurement, so you'll have about 70-ish inches across. Still pretty big.My biggest knock on this projector is that it is VERY hard to find a suitable distance in order to fit it on a 100 foot screen. It seems that the picture has black bars on the top or bottom ... or bleeds over onto the walls on the side. I find that the sweet spot is about 7 feet in front of the screen for a perfect size on a 100 foot screen, which brings a big problem ... this means the projector will have to be set on a table (or a box in my case) which looks very unsightly. In addition, it will likely be in front of the viewer's sitting position, so you'll have a big projector and box setup in front of you. See my photo of the setup and you'll see what I mean. You are starting at the back of the projector and wires and there will be an obstruction in front of you.If you put it low on the table, such as a coffee table, etc. it will distort the picture so the top is wide and the bottom is more narrow and facial features, etc. look a bit distorted and stretched like a fun house mirror. Move the projector behind you and you get a giant image which will be too big for an even 100 inch screen. Move it further in front and you'll get a picture which is smaller and distorted when pointing up.Another knock on this is what it doesn't come with. The little screw in 'leg' which allows you to adjust this up and down is not included. I couldn't believe this ... to not include a part which is such a necessity (and hard to find on its own) is almost worth knocking it down another star. You will NEED to raise this a bit in order to project onto a screen, unless its somehow mounted behind you. I had to use a dustpan, which adds to the unsightliness of my stack of objects making up a projector tower so it can project correctly.Bottom line ... this will be fine for kids but don't think this is going to replace your tv in your living room flawlessly. Batteries for the remote also weren't included, which is fairly standard for projectors even in this price range. The speaker on this is almost useless ... in a quiet room, you might be able to sort of hear the dialog if you concentrate, however, it's barely audible. You will need a speaker to connect, which is hard to find because your option is RCA audio plugs and no speakers on the market work with those. There is no Auxiliary port, so your choices are llimited to RCA jacks and good luck finding those. Even most soundbars use USB or Bluetooth. I tried connecting a speaker via USB which didn't work and the projector has no bluetooth speaker ability. So that could be a big factor.The picture is actually pretty good when you are using a DVD. Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and other streaming services are blocked on here. You cannot use this with those streaming services because they are not licensed to be projected. I was able to get it to mirror my screen using wifi and there was no screen lag, which is nice! My other projector in this pricerange has horrible screen lag, whereas this one is smooth. The colors when you are using wifi screen mirroring are off ... darker, the reds are distorted and look almost more orange, etc. It's good enough to watch a clip or movie but not as clear as a DVD would be. Again, if you use a DVD that is more wires and unsightly clutter in front of you.The lense had a little smudge on it right out of the package ... and actually, the first projector I was sent did not power on right out of the box. The power button would just blink. I was shipped out another one in a matter of days and that one worked fine, aside from the smudge on the lense. This is very lightweight and it feels cheap, so honestly, between the failure of my first attempted shipment, I am not banking on this lasting a long time.There are a lot of issues with this so my recommendation would be to use this for kids' movie nights or gaming for a treat ... but this will not be an average, everyday use projector unless your setup works perfectly distancewise or you are very handy to build some sort of mounting contraption and add on a speaker, DVD player, etc. in order to make it a set. On it's own this is more of a novelty thing ... however, I will say that both the picture quality and the brightness of this were fairly surprising to me ... much higher quality than I expected it to be. I was also surprised how easy the screen mirroring was to set up with my Android phone. Trying to do the same with my IPad was not as easy and I was unable to do this with a hard wired ipad or my ipad's screen mirror.For the price, this isn't bad. It would be a lot nicer if it was easier to project and have it fit the screen without stacking boxes up for it to sit on. If I had it to do over, I might have splurged on a higher-end projector that wasn't as finicky ... or at least came with a little screw in adjustable leg for the bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and high adjustability
reviews.reviewText: The projector is small but shows very good quality and the sound is clear. The color, aspect ratio, focus and zoom can all be adjusted with remote control. I enjoyed the movie on it with my family. It worths the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Weak cord, device won't show
reviews.reviewText: I've tried troubleshooting and my issue is not resolved.First red flag: the cord slips very easily out of the device. I barely move it and it falls right off. Even when plugged in, the power will turn off if the cord isn't positioned very particularly.Second red flag: the lens cap was not packaged and it was missing.Third: device is not recognized by my phone. Effectively this will end up being a barely powered paper weight. I will try to return this product.Very poor quality materials, missing material, and device won't connect to phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: While camping, I realized that we needed a projector so our family could play games and watch movies together. Bringing a TV was clearly not a wise choice. So I chose this one – it's small, portable, and to my surprise, incredibly bright! It has a high lumen output. The image quality is clear enough, and I plan to try it inside the tent next time. All adjustments can be made using the remote control. It's compatible with both Apple and Android for wireless screen mirroring, and it can also be connected to gaming consoles using a wired connection!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Power cord is loose and falls out
reviews.reviewText: The projector itself works great my only real issue is the power cord is extremely loose when plugged in. It will fall out if it moves even the slightest bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This projector is small and easy to carry. I liked the autofocus feature, which saved me time adjusting images. The picture resolution is high, excellent brightness and color is what I need most. It has been with us for many happy weekends.
He estado intentado configurar el Wi-Fi y se regresa a otras pantallas y no abre ningún red. Una total decepción, parecía muy bonito pero no es nada funcional así. Tendré que regresarlo

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad pero no es 1080p nativos
reviews.reviewText: El producto está muy bien pero no son 1080p nativos...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's really beyond my expectation, with a size of 14.1 x 13.4 x 9.8 cm! Fabulous, isn't it? Love it's easy to carry around and supports nearly all functions like WIFI, Bluetooth, and smartphone.Unbelievable to come with 9000lumens, very bright and very impressive compared some other mini competitors. I used to own a palm-size projector, very easy for home or travel use, but not as bright as this lovely development.It supports Dual-Band WiFi, which also an improvement compared with my old belonging. I know 2.4G chips are cheaper but sometimes it's really annoying as not every router supports 2.4G Hz.The image quality is great and I've uploaded picture& video for your reference.Highly recommended.

Ho recentemente acquistato questo mini proiettore e sono rimasto soddisfatto delle sue prestazioni. Innanzitutto, il prezzo è giusto per quello che offre. Il design è estremamente portatile, il che lo rende facile da trasportare ovunque. Posso portarlo in viaggio o utilizzarlo all'aperto senza alcun problema.La qualità dell'immagine è ottima considerando le dimensioni ridotte del proiettore. L'ho proiettato su uno schermo di 100 pollici e sia i film che i giochi sono risultati buoni. Qualsiasi dubbio sulla risoluzione si dissolve immediatamente dopo aver iniziato a guardare i video. Sono rimasto impressionato dalla nitidezza e dalla chiarezza dell'immagine.L'unica volta in cui ho notato qualche problema è stato durante la visualizzazione di scene molto luminose, dove ho notato un po' di washout. Tuttavia, ritengo che sia solo una questione di pignoleria, perché nella maggior parte dei casi l'immagine è adeguata. Inoltre, ho collegato l'USB con video MP4 e la navigazione e il funzionamento sono stati ottimi.Mi aspetto che questo dispositivo duri almeno due anni, ma se dovessi sostituirlo in futuro, lo farei volentieri con lo stesso modello. Il mini proiettore che ho acquistato ha molte funzionalità interessanti, come il supporto WiFi e Bluetooth, che permettono di connettere facilmente altri dispositivi. Inoltre, la compatibilità con sorgenti video 1080P massimizza la qualità dell'immagine e la chiarezza.In conclusione, questo mini proiettore è un ottimo acquisto. Il prezzo è ragionevole, il design è portatile e l'immagine è di alta qualità.

Ce vidéoprojecteur offre une très belle qualité d’images à la fois en photo comme en videoW le vidéoprojecteur peut s’installer facilement partout, dans une chambre, une salle de cinéma, un salon voir même à l’extérieur. Il est bien évidemment préférable de l’utiliser dans un noir complet plutôt que avec le jour, même avec un peu de lumière un retrouve une qualité de projection très belle et agréable.Le projecteur peut s’allier avec un home cinéma pour avoir un son de très bonne qualité.L’image est grande, belle et en haute definition, le projecteur dispose du wifi et du Bluetooth on peut le coupeler avec fire stick, une tv box, une tablette pour accéder aux vidéos comme YouTube, Disney Netflix etc.Il est aussi possible de faire la copie d’écran avec le telephone. Les possibilités de réglage sont nombreuses pour s’adapter à toutes les pièces et les environnements.Bon produit et bon rapport qualité prix.
